name: Box Boy (newjoker6)
description:
This game is about boxboy, it is a pixel perfect platformer leaving death to only be the beginning of your suffering. Can you make the jump and complete all the levels?

I decided t join this jam with less than 12 hours on the clock. I made all the assets including art, music and sfx.

Controls:

A,D to move left and right

W to complete the level when you reach the end

Space to jump
